                    "Value": "xx"
                }
            ],
            "Description": "xx",
            "Job": "xx",
            "Address": "xx",
            "Nationality": "xx",
            "Password": "xx",
            "Nickname": "xx",
            "QqOpenId": "xx",
            "Name": "xx",
            "Gender": "xx",
            "IdentityVerificationMethod": "xx",
            "AlipayUserId": "xx",
            "Birthdate": "2020-09-22",
            "PhoneNumber": "xx",
            "UserGroup": [
                "xx"
            ],
            "PasswordEncryptTypeEnum": "xx",
            "Salt": {
                "SaltLocation": {
                    "SaltLocationRule": {
                        "Regex": "xx"
                    },

                },
                "SaltValue": "xx"
            },
            "QqUnionId": "xx",
            "Locale": "xx",
            "IdentityVerified": true,
            "WechatUnionId": "xx"
        }
    ]
}
